name: Apple
description: A sweet and crisp fruit, commonly red, green, or yellow, and often eaten raw or used in desserts.

name: Carrot
description: A crunchy, orange root vegetable, often used in salads, soups, and stews.

name: Almond
description: A small, brown-skinned nut with a creamy texture, often used in snacks and baking.

name: Strawberry
description: A juicy, red fruit with tiny seeds on the surface, known for its sweet flavor.

name: Spinach
description: A leafy green vegetable rich in iron, often used in salads, smoothies, and cooked dishes.

name: Walnut
description: A brain-shaped nut with a rich, earthy flavor, commonly used in baking and snacks.

name: Banana
description: A soft, sweet fruit with a yellow peel, commonly eaten as a quick snack.

name: Carrot
description: A crunchy, orange root vegetable, often used in salads, soups, and stews.

name: Broccoli
description: A green vegetable with a tree-like structure, rich in vitamins and minerals, often steamed or stir-fried.

name: Cashew
description: A kidney-shaped nut with a creamy texture, popular in cooking and as a snack.

name: Blueberry
description: A small, round fruit with a deep blue color and a sweet-tart flavor, often used in desserts and smoothies.

name: Potato
description: A starchy tuber that can be baked, fried, or mashed, and is a staple in many cuisines.

name: Pecan
description: A rich, buttery-flavored nut, commonly used in pies and desserts.

name: Orange
description: A juicy citrus fruit with a bright orange peel and a tangy-sweet flavor.

name: Tomato
description: A versatile red fruit often used as a vegetable in cooking, known for its juicy texture and tangy taste.

name: Hazelnut
description: A round nut with a rich, sweet flavor, often used in spreads and confectionery.
